html: (2 Nephi 27:2)."Visited … with thunder … earthquake … great noise … storm and tempest." The Lord has often used the elements to call people to repentance. He has specifically warned the inhabitants of the earth in the last days that He will speak to them through these voices of nature. (D&C 43:25; 88:89-91; 97:26; Mormon 8:29; BICQ, 25-37.)
